thread.title: Rep. Don Beyer (D-VA) Announces Men For Women Caucus To The Contrary
thread.title_full: Video: Rep. Don Beyer (D-VA) Announces Men For Women Caucus | Watch To The Contrary Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Rep. Don Beyer (D-VA) Announces Men For Women Caucus To The Contrary
text: Rep. Don Beyer (D-VA) announced the formation of the Men For Women Caucus, an all-male group of Congress members focused on stimulating the economy by empowering women. He was joined by Peter Grauer, chairman of Bloomberg L.P. and part of the 30 Percent Club, a group promoting women's inclusion on corporate boards.
